name: Watch Out For Goblins! (Alpha 1.0)
description:
Club your friends! Throw rocks at your friends! Annihilate your friends with questionable explosives! And all this for FREE? You can't afford NOT to play the "Watch Out For Goblins!" Alpha. 

"Watch Out For Goblins!" Is an innovative physics based strategy game. Take your time, make a plan, line up the perfect shot, then watch chaos ensue as the physics engine takes over.

Watch Out For Goblins! is still in the early stages of development, but we hope you have fun with this multiplayer proof-of-concept alpha! All you need is a PC.

2-4 players can play hotseat with a single gamepad. Keyboard and mouse controls are also supported.
